headline: AFFINITY CHILLER 65000 WATT

specstable:
Manufacturer Affinity
Model CWA-200L-MP15CBD
Cooling System
External Cooling Water Cooled
Cooling Capacity 65,000 W (221,692 BTU/hr)
Temperature Control
Control Stability ± 0.100 ºC
Heat/Cool Controls
Control Type Programmable
Overtemperature Protection YES
Accessories Refrigerant SUVA R-438A- 26-lbs
Other Information Reservoir:
Loop# 1 & 2: 9.15 Gallons (tap water)
Loop# 3: 2.8 Gallons (di water)

Coolant and Pressure:
At 50Hz**
Loop# 1: 30gpm @ 45psi
Loop# 2: 45gpm @ 50psi
Loop# 3: 15gpm @ 40psi
**Flow will be increased at 60Hz

Rated Cooling Capacity:
At 50 Hz*
Loop #1: 15 kW @ 15degC
Loop #2: 30 kW @ 15degC
Loop #3: 20 kW @ Facility Water Temperature +10degC maximum
*Cooling Capacity will be increased at 60 Hz.

Electrical Configuration:
Frequency and Voltage:
@50Hz 400V +5%, -15%
@60Hz 480V +5%, -15%
Phase: 3 phase
Current: 60A
